entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , St. Leonard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, St. Leonard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:25 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16 except minus 22 in low lying areas. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 16 except minus 22 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
